promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive mythical elephant fire-type with white tusks. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Tuskinder, a massive mythical elephant fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: sacred-fire, judgment. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word elephant or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, elephant-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Tuskinder stomps through volcanic terrain, unleashing fiery force powered by sacred judgement.
